alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Gadsden; Gulf; Jackson; Liberty; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 18 at 7:01PM EDT until March 18 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Northwestern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 830 PM EDT/730 PM CDT/. * At 701 PM EDT/601 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 15 miles southwest of Marianna to 8 miles south of Panama City Beach, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Blountstown, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Orange, Bradford, Parker, Wewahitchka, Bristol, Altha, Wausau, Rock Bluff, Honeyville and Clarksville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT/700 PM CDT/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT/700 PM CDT/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida.

area.areaDesc: Bay; Calhoun; Gadsden; Gulf; Jackson; Liberty; Washington
